Jack McCloskey

Detroit Pistons, Minnesota Timberwolves

Draft Rating:

A-

Jack McCloskey ranks in the 80th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. McCloskey's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 8 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Micheal Williams with 48th pick but was worth 7th pick.
  • Drafted Joe Dumars with 18th pick but was worth 8th pick.
  • Drafted Dennis Rodman with 27th pick but was worth 7th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Isaiah Rider with 5th pick but was worth 37th pick.
  • Drafted Christian Laettner with 3th pick but was worth 5th pick.
  • Drafted Tony Campbell with 20th pick but was worth 53th pick.

Trade Rating:

B

Jack McCloskey ranks in the 71th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Kenny Carr, Bill Laimbeer to DET.
  • Lost Phil Hubbard, Paul Mokeski, John Bagley, Dave Magley to CLE.
Their biggest L:
  • Added David Thirdkill to DET.
  • Lost Jeff Hornacek to PHO.

Signing Rating:

F

Jack McCloskey ranks in the 10th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Gerald Henderson in 1989.
  • Signed Cozell McQueen in 1987.
  • Signed Stanley Jackson in 1993.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Earl Cureton in 1983.
  • Signed Darrick Martin in 1995.
  • Signed Bob McCann in 1992.
